Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Montrose
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Montrose due to the report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Montrose due to the report of a minor fire at track level.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
